title: Bracelet of Two Joined Sections
description:
Made of a hollow curved golden tube, with ram's head terminals.  The terminals, which are also hollow were added separately.  The piece is broken into two parts, a and b. Each of the fragments consists of one of the terminals and part of the tube.
Condition of a: The piece is mostly crushed; some cracks.
Condition of b: Piece is partly crushed.
dimensions:
Fragment a: 5/16 x 2 3/16 in. (0.9 x 5.5 cm)
Fragment b: 5/16 x 2 3/16 in. (0.8 x 5.6 cm)
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas S. Brush

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
